Name: Taxicabs etal., Penalties Refusals and Overcharges
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to additional penalties for refusals and overcharges by drivers of taxicabs and for-hire vehicles.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Subdivision b of section 19-507 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph 3, to read as follows:
	3. Nothing contained in this section shall limit the authority of the commission to suspend or revoke a driver=s license on the basis of a combination of violations of applicable law or regulations of the commission, including one or more of the violations specified in subdivision a of this section.
	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 



	-1-




	-1-
